channel.title: Flutter-Package on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter-Package on Arrans github.io

item.title: BirjuVachhani/adaptive_theme
item.description: Easiest way to add support for light and dark theme in your flutter app.

item.title: AppFlowy-IO/appflowy-editor
item.description: A highly customizable rich-text editor for Flutter. The AppFlowy Editor project for AppFlowy and beyond.

item.title: Sub6Resources/flutter_html
item.description: A Flutter widget for rendering static html as Flutter widgets (Will render over 80 different html tags!)

item.title: jama5262/jiffy
item.description: Jiffy is a Flutter (Android, IOS and Web) date time package for parsing, manipulating, querying and formatting dates

item.title: oi-narendra/multiselect-dropdown
item.description: Streamlined Flutter widget for versatile multi-selection with extensive customization.

item.title: afonsocraposo/buttons_tabbar
item.description: A Flutter package that implements a TabBar where each label is a toggle button.

item.title: letsar/gap
item.description: Flutter widgets for easily adding gaps inside Flex widgets such as Columns and Rows or scrolling views

item.title: krishnakumarcn/faded
item.description: Client did not pay? Add opacity to widgets and decrease it every day until their app completely fades away. Set a due date and customize the number of days you offer them until the app is fully vanished.
